sn21.10:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn21.10:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu theranāmako ekavihārī ceva hoti ekavihārassa ca vaṇṇavādī.
sn21.10:4.3: So eko gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati eko paṭikkamati eko raho nisīdati eko caṅkamaṃ adhiṭṭhāti.
sn21.10:4.4: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn21.10:4.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn21.10:4.7: “idha, bhante, aññataro bhikkhu theranāmako ekavihārī ekavihārassa ca vaṇṇavādī”ti.
sn21.10:5.1: Atha kho bhagavā aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesi:
sn21.10:5.2: “ehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mama vacanena theraṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantehi:
sn21.10:5.4: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā yenāyasmā thero tenupasaṅkami;
sn21.10:5.7: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā thero tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn21.10:5.9: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ theraṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn21.10:5.10: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, thera, ekavihārī ekavihārassa ca vaṇṇavādī”ti?
sn21.10:5.12: “Yathā kathaṃ pana tvaṃ, thera, ekavihārī ekavihārassa ca vaṇṇavādī”ti?
sn21.10:5.13: “Idhāhaṃ, bhante, eko gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisāmi eko paṭikkamāmi eko raho nisīdāmi eko caṅkamaṃ adhiṭṭhāmi.
sn21.10:5.14: Evaṃ khvāhaṃ, bhante, ekavihārī ekavihārassa ca vaṇṇavādī”ti.
sn21.10:6.2: Api ca, thera, yathā ekavihāro vitthārena paripuṇṇo hoti taṃ suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi;
sn21.10:6.6: Idha, thera, yaṃ atītaṃ taṃ pahīnaṃ, yaṃ anāgataṃ taṃ paṭinissaṭṭhaṃ, paccuppannesu ca attabhāvapaṭilābhesu chandarāgo suppaṭivinīto.
sn21.10:6.7: Evaṃ kho, thera, ekavihāro vitthārena paripuṇṇo hotī”ti.
sn21.10:7.2: Idaṃ vatvāna sugato athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā:
